featured.text: Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.
The revolution turned out to be 34 and eventually led to the formation of the Ming Dynasty.

definition.zh_def: 明亮的，清晰的，或顯而易見的。
definition.example: The stars were so ming that they lit up the entire sky.
